text: Kit Harington may currently play the character you know and love as Jon Snow, but it turns out the actor auditioned for plenty of other roles on Game of Thrones before landing the King in the North. Thanks to a new sketch on Jimmy Kimmel Live, we now have ` ` footage'' of Harington's ` ` never - before - seen screen tests'' for other major characters in the series. And his auditions are priceless.
